meanings.definition: The art or process of working metal to create decorative objects.
meanings.sent1: She learned about toreutics in her art class.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed beautiful examples of toreutics.
meanings.sent3: The toreutics on the vase made it look like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: His skill in toreutics transformed the plain metal into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of toreutics sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The decorative work produced by the art of working metal.
meanings.sent1: The toreutics on the shield were stunning.
meanings.sent2: Artisans showcased their exquisite toreutics at the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The toreutics on the door handle added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry designs were inspired by the ancient toreutics.
meanings.sent5: The museum's collection of toreutics was truly impressive.
